医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
结直肠癌诊断中的传统和前沿内窥镜模式自 20 世纪初诞生以来，胃肠道 (GI) 内窥镜检查的发展已经改变了结直肠癌的诊断方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Traditional-and-cutting-edge-endooscopy-modalities-in-colorectal-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Traditional-and-cutting-edge-endooscopy-modalities-in-colorectal-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6c339f7-d341-43c6-b83b-cf0ea01b6690 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:40:48 -0500 Traditional and cutting-edge endoscopic modalities in colorectal cancer diagnosis
探索急性卒中试验中传统知情同意替代方案的当前使用和未来辛辛那提大学的医学博士亚斯明·阿齐兹 (Yasmin Aziz) 和医学博士约瑟夫·布罗德里克 (Joseph Broderick) 于 11 月 7 日在《神经学》杂志上合着了一篇社论，分析了急性中风试验中传统知情同意替代方案的当前使用情况和潜在未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-current-use-and-future-of-alternatives-to-traditional-informed-consent-in-acute-中风-试验.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-current-use-and-future-of-alternatives-to-traditional-informed-consent-in-acute-中风-试验.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c65fb38-0a22-4a6e-8091-4a7a3160a388 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:36:32 -0500 Exploring the current use and future of alternatives to traditional informed consent in acute stroke trials
对丹尼索瓦人遗传遗产的新见解科学家认为，最近发现的“古人类”群体（丹尼索瓦人）的个体与现代人类杂交，通过多次不同的杂交事件传递了一些基因，这些事件帮助塑造了早期人类历史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-insights-into-the-genic-legacy-of-Denisovans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-insights-into-the-genic-legacy-of-Denisovans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e55b7d0-acc1-41dd-accf-fb936b0c635a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:28:13 -0500 New insights into the genetic legacy of Denisovans
探索药用植物的抗癌潜力癌症仍然是全球主要死亡原因之一，由于生活方式、环境和遗传因素，癌症病例估计有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-anticancer-pottial-of-medicinal-plants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-anticancer-pottial-of-medicinal-plants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b28846a-ee25-40fa-9d9c-1197558e6c71 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:22:30 -0500 Exploring the anticancer potential of medicinal plants
新发现可能会带来更好的耐药白血病治疗方法杜克大学-新加坡国立大学医学院的科学家及其合作者发现了一种在东亚人中普遍存在的遗传变异，这种变异会导致耐药性，从而推动慢性粒细胞白血病患者癌细胞的侵袭性生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-discovery-could-lead-to-better-treatments-for-drug-pressive-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-discovery-could-lead-to-better-treatments-for-drug-pressive-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=357d97aa-6552-43fd-a55c-c20ee6139b77 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:18:59 -0500 New discovery could lead to better treatments for drug-resistant leukemia
麻省理工学院团队创建了识别因果基因关系的有效技术通过研究基因表达的变化，研究人员了解细胞如何在分子水平上发挥作用，这可以帮助他们了解某些疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/MIT-team-creates-efficient-technique-for-identifying-causal-gene-relationships.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/MIT-team-creates-efficient-technique-for-identifying-causal-gene-relationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81ccb46d-9d0d-4884-b5de-0535364354b6 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:07:50 -0500 MIT team creates efficient technique for identifying causal gene relationships
研究揭示不同种族、民族和性别群体的福祉存在巨大差异健康指标与评估研究所 (IHME) 在《柳叶刀》上发表了一项新研究，发现种族和族裔群体、性别和年龄组之间的幸福感存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Study-reveals-deep-disparities-in-well-being-across-racial-ethnic-and-sex-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Study-reveals-deep-disparities-in-well-being-across-racial-ethnic-and-sex-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b24792-9775-4be5-a1bf-de20025fa4ab Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:02:50 -0500 Study reveals deep disparities in well-being across racial, ethnic, and sex groups
研究表明盲文用户在复杂考试中的时间延长不足学生经常参加高风险的考试，这些考试对他们的未来具有重要意义。其中一项考试是大学招生通用考试，目前允许使用盲文的考生将考试时间延长为标准时间的 1.5 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Study-reveals-inadequacy-of-time-extensions-for-Braille-users-in-complex-exams.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Study-reveals-inadequacy-of-time-extensions-for-Braille-users-in-complex-exams.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee80731a-10bb-4c2d-9ea5-ee91263b1263 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 20:58:22 -0500 Study reveals inadequacy of time extensions for Braille users in complex exams
登山小鼠提供了对局部条件的进化适应的见解登山小鼠团队正在帮助加深对局部条件的进化适应如何使单一物种能够在不同环境中茁壮成长的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Mountaineering-mice-offer-insight-into-evolutionary-adaptation-to-localized-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Mountaineering-mice-offer-insight-into-evolutionary-adaptation-to-localized-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f949e14-b366-4d2a-8fc1-ecec1a017c47 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 20:54:57 -0500 Mountaineering mice offer insight into evolutionary adaptation to localized conditions
许多选民支持堕胎权和唐纳德·特朗普，这是对民主党的挑战亚利桑那州、密苏里州和内华达州这三个州的选民周二选择在州宪法中推进对堕胎权的保护。与此同时，唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)很可能赢得所有三个州的胜利，入主白宫。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Many-voters-backed-abortion-rights-and-Donald-Trump-a-challenge-for-Democrats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Many-voters-backed-abortion-rights-and-Donald-Trump-a-challenge-for-Democrats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=443c67d3-13d4-4ae9-a3a5-0d401dec6e0b Fri, 08 Nov 2024 20:51:19 -0500 Many voters backed abortion rights and Donald Trump, a challenge for Democrats
